Body:
svy = ineqpy.api.Survey
data = np.random.randint(0, 100, (int(1000.0), 3))
w = np.random.randint(1, 10, int(1000.0))
data = np.c_[data, w]
columns = list('abcw')
df = svy(data=data, columns=columns, weights='w')
df.weights
df.mean('a')
df.var('a')
df.skew('a')
df.kurt('a')
df.gini('a')
df.atkinson('a')
df.theil('a')
df.percentile('a')
